item.description:
Some topics we will discuss at our next meetings in Unitarian Church Fall River, MA and East Bay Chamber of Commerce in Warren, RI

 

Building our Dream from the top down...what that means and how to do it...

How to sift through the contrast and data that the Universe is throwing & Showing us... and use it to build our continue to build our dreams...

Understanding our Vortex, center of Creation and Co-Creation with the Divine and all in the non-physical...and how to attract what's in it...

Feeling our way to positive emotions regarding whatever is our "challenge, obstacle, block, illusion, fear, doubt or worry"...

From One extreme to the other...balancing the emotions through "chaos, turmoil, dissillusionment, energetic confusion"...how to use the law of attraction to do that

This is a great group to "tune" into when you are wanting alignment to your path, dreams, mission and reason for being...

Lots of wonderful like-minded people who offer their unique perspectives...

A Co-creative night of connection with each other, the Universe, The Divine and ALL that IS

They say Practice makes Perfect...come practice with the Leading Edge Consciousness aka Law of attraction aka Law of Mind Action

This class will set you in the right direction of alignment to and having the life you desire !

I've been running Law of Attraction meetings for over three years and learned from so many people in my groups, seen the manifestation of many peoples desires and dreams and Abraham "consciousness"(as understood by Ester and Jerry Hicks) is oftentimes present at our meetings...their videos and CD's are often used in siteing examples and stimulating interesting positive discussion regarding various topics that affect us all...

Looking forward to seeing, meeting and being with you at an upcoming meeting!

Please RSVP if you plan on coming!  In Gratitude and Blessings Magnificent Manifestors...

Namaste, Nicole

group.name: South Shore Law of Attraction Manifestors

item.name: Manifesting...Connecting... Discussing Law of Attraction in Action
